Megatron clenches his fists and teeth at the noise of his long time
hatred. (Starscream) He thought to himself. How he hated the robot who
did worse than killed him and his dream. That treaturous fool ruined
everything Megatron ever created. He held up his cannon and aimed it at
the unready Skyscream. The melodic hum of atomic energy building up in
the base of his cannon only pushed his anger. He grited his teeth hard,
and matched the sudden outburst of energy from his cannon with a
sadistic scream and he fired on Skyscream, the torrent of raw power
matching Megatrons mood. "Destruction to all traitors" He yelled.


Motormaster looked at the Situation unfolding into chaos. He jumped back
up to the top of the hill remembering the real reason they were here. He
scanned the battle field for Shockwave (Kslawdogg, you will have to tell
me what is going on with him).


Wildrider gracefully caught Symphony on his hood, and then used his
anti-gravitational abilitys to soar from over the ocean to dry land, and
roared towards the CF.
